Package controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainController
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
Class MainController is controller of the other controllers. All scene controllers has a reference to this controller to communicate with it. NetworkController communicates with it through the buffers. In this class, only the general and recurring logic is handled, such as setting scenes (inner class), pop-up windows and closing the program.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MainController​(javafx.stage.Stage mainWindow)
    Starts the network that connects to the server and creates and populates the ScenesHashMap.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void closeProgram()
    This method is used both when the user hits the button to close to program, and if the user tries to shut down the program using the standard close option in the OS (for example: X in the top right corner of the window).
    void LogIn​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String Password)  
    boolean popUpWindow​(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message)
    Uses a static class Alarm to create Pop-Up boxes.
    void QuizTest​(java.lang.String Quiz)
    Method is used to pass object of questions to network Controller.
    void sendSelfToControllers​(javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loader)
    Uses the interface SceneControllerParent (used by all Scene-controllers) to send itself to the scene-controller for the FXML-file loaded in to the FXMLLoader.
    void setScene​(ScenesEnum sceneToShow)
    Changes the current scene that is being displayed on the Stage.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainController

      public MainController​(javafx.stage.Stage mainWindow)
      Starts the network that connects to the server and creates and populates the ScenesHashMap. It also sets up the window with the correct information for the start screen.
      Parameters:
      mainWindow - The main window where the scenes are displayed (received from Main)

  • Method Details

    • sendSelfToControllers

      public void sendSelfToControllers​(javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loader)
      Uses the interface SceneControllerParent (used by all Scene-controllers) to send itself to the scene-controller for the FXML-file loaded in to the FXMLLoader. This gives the Scene-controllers a reference to this MainController.
      Parameters:
      loader - The loader for a specific FXML-file. This gives access to that files specified controller.

    • setScene

      public void setScene​(ScenesEnum sceneToShow)
      Changes the current scene that is being displayed on the Stage.
      Parameters:
      sceneToShow - The ScenesEnum-name of the Scene that should be displayed.

    • popUpWindow

      public boolean popUpWindow​(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message)
      Uses a static class Alarm to create Pop-Up boxes. The box will be the only interactive object until it has been handled by the user. The code is only made for using the AlertTypes Confirm (Yes/no-option) and Error (Only OK).
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of box. Confirm gives a box with OK and Cancel buttons. Error only gives an OK button.
      title - The title of the pop-up window
      message - The message shown in the pop-up window.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the user pressed the OK button, otherwise returns false. The return value is not always useful (the Error Pop-Up only has one option, for example) and it is up to the developer to handle it correctly.

    • closeProgram

      public void closeProgram()
      This method is used both when the user hits the button to close to program, and if the user tries to shut down the program using the standard close option in the OS (for example: X in the top right corner of the window).

    • LogIn

      public void LogIn​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String Password)

    • QuizTest

      public void QuizTest​(java.lang.String Quiz)
      Method is used to pass object of questions to network Controller.
      Parameters:
      Quiz - The quiz String that is used to send it to the neworkController
